pageProduct.name: Wellgrove Heart Health Support Olive Leaf Extract Natural 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Wellgrove Heart Health is an extra strength olive leaf extract, which is a naturally derived preservative free option to support heart and cholesterol health.

Warnings

Please consult a healthcare professional before use if: diagnosed medical conditions; taking any other medications, pregnant or breastfeeding; under 12 years. Keep out of reach of children. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist, see your health professional.

Common Uses

HEART HEALTH Helps support heart health, helps maintain healthy cholesterol levels and helps maintain healthy blood lipids. ANTIOXIDANT BOOST & IMMUNE SUPPORT Provides antioxidants that help reduce free radicals formed in the body. Helps promote general health and wellbeing when used as part of a healthy lifestyle. Traditionally used in herbal medicine (western) to help support immune system health and help relieve symptoms of common colds and flu.

Ingredients

olefreshTM Olea europaea (Olive) leaf extract, glycerol, natural flavour.

Directions

Adults (Children 12+ years & Adults): 15ml daily Take with food. Can be taken undiluted, added to water, juice or a smoothie. Best consumed chilled. Natural settling may occur. Storage Instructions: Store upright and below 30°c in a dry place, away from sunlight. Consume within 3 months of opening.
